title: Cutscene

properties.name: description
properties.value: A cutscene is an animated sequence usually occurring during a quest in which a player has no control, and are often used to show the storyline of a certain quest. Cutscenes also occur during some transportation sequences such as charter ships, the eagle transport system and canoes.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Cutscene
A cutscene that is played during Forgettable Tale...

A cutscene is an animated sequence usually occurring during a quest in which a player has no control, and are often used to show the storyline of a certain quest. Cutscenes also occur during some transportation sequences such as charter ships, the eagle transport system and canoes.

During a cutscene, a player cannot talk, move, or click on most things to perform action they can normally do, except examining objects or NPCs. Although in some cutscenes, the player will say something above their heads without typing it.

There are currently only a few possible cutscenes that can be re-watched:

  • The Burning brazier replays cutscenes from Monkey Madness II.
  • The Pool of Dreams replays cutscenes from Dragon Slayer II.
  • The Draynor bank robbery can be replayed by speaking to the banker outside Draynor Village bank by paying 50gp per viewing.
  • The Memoriam device replays cutscenes from Song of the Elves.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
[[File:Forgettable Tale of a Drunken Dwarf drinking.png|thumb|250px|A cutscene that is played during [[Forgettable Tale...]]]]
A '''cutscene''' is an animated sequence usually occurring during a [[quest]] in which a player has no control, and are often used to show the storyline of a certain quest. Cutscenes also occur during some [[transportation]] sequences such as [[charter ship]]s, the [[eagle transport system]] and [[canoe]]s.

During a cutscene, a player cannot talk, move, or click on most things to perform action they can normally do, except examining objects or [[NPC]]s. Although in some cutscenes, the player will say something above their heads without typing it.

There are currently only a few possible cutscenes that can be re-watched:
*The [[Burning brazier]] replays cutscenes from [[Monkey Madness II]].
*The [[Pool of Dreams]] replays cutscenes from [[Dragon Slayer II]].
*The [[Draynor bank robbery]] can be replayed by speaking to the banker outside [[Draynor Village]] bank by paying 50gp per viewing.
*The [[Memoriam device]] replays cutscenes from [[Song of the Elves]].
